DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , non-randomized , multicenter , pivotal Investigational Device Exemption ( IDE ) study . The intent study demonstrate safety effectiveness ST Monitoring Feature St Jude Medical ICD system .
DOC.brief_title: ST Monitoring Detect Acute Coronary Syndrome Events Implantable Cardioverter Defibrillator Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , non-randomized , multicenter , pivotal IDE study . The intent study demonstrate safety effectiveness ST Monitoring Feature Fortify® ST , Fortify Assura® ST , Ellipse® ST family device , well future St Jude Medical device ST Monitoring Feature capability . Effectiveness device evaluate analyze sensitivity ST Monitoring Feature detect clinical event . In addition , safety ST Monitoring Feature evaluate demonstrate low percentage patient false positive event .
DOC.criteria: Eligible patient meet following : 1 . Have indication ICD implantation pulse generator change 2 . Have document coronary artery disease . Documented coronary artery disease define least one follow present ) evidence prior MI ECG and/or cardiac enzyme , b ) prior revascularization ( coronary artery bypass graft percutaneous coronary intervention ) c ) angina and/or STT wave abnormality indicative ischemia exercise stress test , nuclear stress test , echo stress test , ) coronary artery disease diagnose coronary angiography . 3 . Willing able comply protocol requirement , include keep required visit 4 . Willing participate study able sign IRB approve informed consent form 5 . Be least 18 year age enrol study Patients exclude meet following : 1 . Are pacemaker dependent ( define need ventricular pace ≥ 20 % time ) 2 . Have NYHA Class IV Heart Failure 3 . Have persistent permanent atrial fibrillation 4 . Have know history intermittent Bundle Branch Block 5 . Pregnant planning pregnancy study participation 6 . Have life expectancy < 1 year due condition 7 . Are currently participate clinical investigation include active treatment arm .
